import React, {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import {useDispatch} from "react-redux"; import {updateCurrentBusinessProfile} from "../../services/businessProfileService"; const EditBusinessUserProfileComponent =({profile, setEditProfile})=>{ const [localProfile, setLocalProfile] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { setLocalProfile(profile); }, []); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const updateProfileClickHandler = () => { updateCurrentBusinessProfile(dispatch, localProfile); } return (

Edit Profile

setEditProfile(false)} className="fas fa-times wd-white ms-3 mb-2 ">
{ setLocalProfile({...localProfile, firstName: event.target.value}) }} className="form-control" id="inputFirstName4" defaultValue={profile.firstName} />
); } export default EditBusinessUserProfileComponent;
